targets.rawSql:
select * from (



(SELECT datetime, (datetime - '$around_this_date'::timestamptz) as diff, chain, block_number FROM block_ts WHERE chain = 'arbitrum' and datetime between '$around_this_date'::timestamptz - '$_look_around'::interval and '$around_this_date'::timestamptz + '$_look_around'::interval and datetime <= '$around_this_date' ORDER BY datetime DESC LIMIT 1) UNION ALL (SELECT datetime, (datetime - '$around_this_date'::timestamptz) as diff, chain, block_number FROM block_ts WHERE chain = 'arbitrum' and datetime between '$around_this_date'::timestamptz - '$_look_around'::interval and '$around_this_date'::timestamptz + '$_look_around'::interval and datetime >= '$around_this_date' ORDER BY datetime ASC LIMIT 1)
